snippet: The conductor Pablo Heras-Casado, 34, has only recently begun engaging with the most popular classical music, having concentrated before on both early and contemporary compositions.
abstract: Conductor Pablo Heras-Casada, who is the new principal conductor of the Orchestra of St Luke's, has only recently begun engaging with more popular classical music, having concentrated before on both early and contemporary compositions.
lead_paragraph: The conductor Pablo Heras-Casado, 34, has only recently begun engaging with the most popular classical music, having concentrated before on both early and contemporary compositions.

headline.seo: Pablo Heras-Casado, With Orchestra of St. Luke’s
headline.main: A Renaissance Man, and Many Eras Besides
headline.print_headline: A Renaissance Man, And Many Eras Besides
